clinical_study.brief_title: Developing Violence Prevention Therapy for Substance Abusers
clinical_study.official_title: Development of Violence Therapy for Substance Abusers

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this project is to develop and pilot test a violence prevention intervention for men and women in treatment for substance use problems.

arm_group.description: Intervention based on Motivational Interviewing and CBT

intervention.description: Violence prevention intervention based on Motivational Interviewing and CBT

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Presence of substance use related problems
- Interpersonal Violence history in the year before recruitment
Exclusion Criteria:
- Primary opiate dependence
- Presence of active psychotic disorder
- < 18 years of age
